meanings.definition: Unable to be limited or restricted in extent or scope.
meanings.sent1: The possibilities of the universe are illimitable.
meanings.sent2: The ocean's illimitable expanse stretched out before us.
meanings.sent3: Her appetite for ice cream seemed illimitable!
meanings.sent4: His imagination soared to illimitable heights.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity knew no bounds, it was truly illimitable.

meanings.definition: Boundless or infinite in extent or size.
meanings.sent1: The desert's illimitable sands seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent2: The night sky's illimitable stars twinkled above us.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's energy was truly illimitable, running around all day!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as illimitable as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range's illimitable beauty took our breath away.
